name: GREENFIELD TOWNSHIP MUNICIPAL AUTHORITY, Respondent, v. GORDON L. DELOZIER, INC., Petitioner
name_abbreviation: Greenfield Township Municipal Authority v. Gordon L. Delozier, Inc.

judges: Mr. Justice EAKIN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
parties: GREENFIELD TOWNSHIP MUNICIPAL AUTHORITY, Respondent, v. GORDON L. DELOZIER, INC., Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of March 2002, WE GRANT the Petition for Allowance of Appeal LIMITED to the following issue:
"Whether, pursuant to the terms of this contract, attachment of Exhibit GC-A indicates that the parties agreed to submit to arbitration, or whether an additional writing was necessary to invoke the alternative dispute resolution provisions referenced in the contract documents?
This matter is to be SUBMITTED ON BRIEFS.
Mr. Justice EAKIN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
791 A.2d 1153
GREENFIELD TOWNSHIP MUNICIPAL AUTHORITY, Respondent, v. GORDON L. DELOZIER, INC., Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 19, 2002.
